text: Christopher Percy Gordon Blackwell OJ (born 22 June 1937) is a Jamaican- British former record producer and the founder of Island Records. He was honored into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2001. Variety called him as "one of the greatest record executives in history". ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:British record producers Category:Jamaican businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Chris Blackwell
